name: Raja Mahesh Aravapalli
tagline: Architecting Intelligent Systems @ Microsoft | AI & Data at Scale

about.title: About Me
bio: I architect intelligent systems that solve real-world problems at scale. As a Senior Software Engineer and Tech Lead at Microsoft, I design and build AI-powered solutions that process massive data volumes, drive business impact, and push the boundaries of what's possible.

My expertise spans distributed systems, machine learning infrastructure, data engineering pipelines, and cloud-native architecture. I'm passionate about transforming complex AI/Data challenges into elegant, scalable solutions while mentoring teams to deliver technical excellence.

I believe in building systems that are intelligent, resilient, and maintainable. Advocate for engineering rigor, collaborative problem-solving, and continuous innovation. Committed to driving impactful technical decisions and sharing knowledge that shapes the next generation of engineers.

payMe.title: Payment Info
payMe.description: Available for consulting and collaboration opportunities.
